lines.text: Atranta isn't fantasy, it's real!... You'll see.

[Babs and Ellen notice a peephole in the wall, and when Babs looks into it, she sees Ronald's eye staring back at her. Both girls scream in fright and Ronald simultaneously tumbles out from the wall, rolling down the front stairs]
[Ronald rolls outside and finds himself surrounded by cops waiting to arrest him]
You must stay in the lair until it's safe! Ms. Schumacher has been watching our house like a hawk!
Your parents won't be home until Sunday.

[creeped out]
How do you know that?
I'm Prince Norbert, ruler of Atranta! I know everything.
What do you think of this place?

[hesitantly]
I guess I never thought I'd be eating here.
[Babs drops her dinner spoon in shock]
